animationPicker_failedToParseImage: The image could not be parsed
animationPicker_unsupportedType: Sorry, this file type is not supported.
animationPicker_unsupportedSize: Please make sure the image you are trying to upload is smaller than 100 KB.
animationPicker_warning: Warning: Do not upload anything that contains personal information.
dropletBlock_Game.width_description: The width of the drawing canvas.
dropletBlock_Game.height_description: The height of the drawing canvas.
dropletBlock_createSprite_description: Creates a sprite at the initial specified position.
dropletBlock_createSprite_param2_descrip: Width of the placeholder rectangle and of the collider until an image or new collider are set.
dropletBlock_createSprite_param3_descrip: Height of the placeholder rectangle and of the collider until an image or new collider are set.
dropletBlock_addToGroup_description: Adds the sprite to the given group.
dropletBlock_addToGroup_param0_descripti: Existing group to add the sprite to.
dropletBlock_setCollider_description: Sets the invisible circle or rectangle which will be used to detect collisions with other sprites, or the mouse cursor.
dropletBlock_setCollider_param3_descript: If using a circle collider, this parameter gives its radius.  If a rectangle, this is its width.
dropletBlock_setCollider_param4_descript: If a using a rectangle collider, this is its height.
dropletBlock_setCollider_param5_descript: If using a rotatable collider, this is its rotation offset (in degrees).
dropletBlock_setColliderEach_description: Sets a collider for all sprites in the group.
dropletBlock_setColliderEach_param3_desc: If using a circle collider, this parameter gives its radius.  If a rectangle, this is its width.
dropletBlock_setColliderEach_param4_desc: If a using a rectangle collider, this is its height.
dropletBlock_setColliderEach_param5_desc: If using a rotatable collider, this is its rotation offset (in degrees).
dropletBlock_shape_signatureOverride: shape(x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN)
dropletBlock_add_description: Adds the given sprite to group.
dropletBlock_remove_description: Removes the given sprite from group.
reinfFeedbackMsg: You're finished! Click "Continue" to move on to the next level.
